item.title: DC/OS on KVM CoreOS VMs
item.description: In this article we will automate the DC/OS installation procedure specifically for CoreOS VMs running on KVM (libvirt).

item.title: Compiling Local DC/OS Universe
item.description:
DC/OS offers its users the ability to install various frameworks with a single click from a central publicly hosted package repository called Universe.

Many Mesosphere clients run their DC/OS clusters in air-gapped environments with no access to the internet, thus not allowing for said one click installation of framework packages.

You can easily solve this problem if your DC/OS cluster is running in such a restricted environment.

item.title: Automating advanced DC/OS installation.
item.description: In this article we will look at automating the advanced DC/OS installation procedure. We will break down the requirements and look for opportunities to speed up the lengthy installation.
